availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert M. Green, Sr. (Simpson County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, merchant. Tennessee native. Son of John Green and Janet Green. Married to Letetia R. Moore Green. Father of James W. Green, Mary J. Green, Frances E. Green, Sarah E. Green, Florence Green, Robert M. Green Jr., and Martha B. Green. Merchant in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 136.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 307B.
